bgDescription: A special dish that originated in the Huanglong army. Huanglong soldiers would use an engineer's shovel as an iron plate, and after heating, they would grill and enjoy the ingredients. This way of eating was later passed back to the home by the retired soldiers and became a famous dish.
description: Increases all team members' Crit. Rate by 16%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases all team members' Crit. Rate by 16%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
